successes.title: Euphoria: Build a Better Dystopia
successes.description: Build a city, enhance allegiances, and expand control using worker dice in this dystopian-themed board game for 2-6 players.

Pledges.description: TOAST - Jamey and Alan will toast you on camera using Euphorian-themed beverages. Just like all pledge levels, you get access to the print-and-play version of the game and all updates.

DELUXE - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe ("deluxe" = full game with all stretch goals). US, Canada, and European Union only (free shipping & customs included). Extra copies are $49/each. Euphoria will retail at $70.

SUPREME - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe, 1 extra set of 24 custom steampunk dice, and 1 special-edition set of 44 recruit cards with sketched faces, all included in the same game box. US, Canada, European Union, and China only (free shipping & customs included).

IMMORTAL - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe + your name immortalized on one artifact card in every deluxe copy of the game. US, Canada, and European Union only (free shipping & customs included). Extra copies are $49/each.

US VITICULTURE - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe + 1 retail copy of Viticulture. US only (shipping & customs included for both games). Extra copies of Euphoria are $49/each. You will receive Viticulture in late June.

ADVANCE - 1 advance copy of Euphoria deluxe signed by the designers. The advance copy will arrive about 1-2 months earlier than any other game. Free US shipping; $45 international. Extra copies shipped in December to backers in the US, Canada, & EU are $49/each.

CANADA VITICULTURE - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe + 1 retail copy of Viticulture regular. Canada only (shipping & customs included for both games). Extra copies of Euphoria are $49/each. You will receive Viticulture in late June.

EU VITICULTURE - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe + 1 retail copy of Viticulture. EU only (shipping & customs included for both games). Extra copies of Euphoria are $49/each. You will receive Viticulture in late June.

FULL KS VITICULTURE - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe + 1 full Kickstarter copy of Viticulture. Shipping included for US, Canada, and the EU (Euphoria shipped in December 2013, Viticulture in late June 2013). Other locations: add $45 shipping to receive both games together in December or add $75 total shipping to receive Viticulture in early July and Euphoria in December. Extra copies of Euphoria are $49/each.

MODEL - Your face, hair, and name will be featured on a recruit card in every copy of the game. Includes 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe. US, Canada, and European Union only (free shipping & customs included). Extra copies are $49/each.
COURIER - 2 copies of Euphoria deluxe for backers NOT in the US, Canada, or the EU. Shipping included. Add up to 1 copy for $49.

ANYWHERE VITICULTURE - 1 copy of Euphoria deluxe + 1 retail copy of Viticulture delivered together anywhere in the world in December. Add $30 if you would like Viticulture shipped to you separately in June.
COURIER SUPREME - 2 copies of Euphoria supreme for backers NOT in the US, Canada, or the EU. Shipping included. Add up to 1 supreme copy for $59.
PACIFIC - 10 copies of Euphoria deluxe shipped to one destination in Asia, Australia, or New Zealand only. Free shipping included (see project page for more details). Extra copies are $49/each.
BULK - 10 copies of Euphoria delivered anywhere in the world. Free shipping included. Extra copies are $49/each.
